inclusion.criterion: Men and women 18 years of age or older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Presence of chronic HCV infection, defined by presence of plasma or serum HCV RNA in a participant with HCV antibody for at least 180 days
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum or plasma HCV RNA level 10,000 IU/mL or greater obtained within 42 days prior to study entry.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Screening HCV genotype 1 performed within 6 months prior to study entry
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Liver biopsy or HCV FibroSURE™ test within 104 weeks prior to study entry with interpretation consistent with chronic HCV infection
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Alpha feto protein (AFP) levels less than 50
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Currently not on any antiretroviral therapy (ART) for at least 4 weeks immediately prior to entry or on stable ART for at least 8 weeks prior to study entry using a dual NRTI backbone PLUS one of the following: EFV, RAL, LPV/RTV 400/100 mg twice daily, ATV/RTV, DRV/RTV 600/100 mg twice daily
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: CD4+ T-cell count greater than 200 cells/mm^3 obtained within 42 days prior to study entry.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: For participants on ART, screening plasma HIV-1 RNA less than 50 copies/mL obtained within 42 days prior to study entry. For participants not on ART, plasma HIV-1 RNA less than 50,000 copies/mL obtained within 42 days prior to study entry.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The following laboratory values within 42 days prior to entry: Absolute neutrophil count (ANC) 1000/mm^3 or greater
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Hemoglobin greater than 12 g/dL for men and greater than 11 g/dL for women
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Platelet count greater than 80,000 per mm^3
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Known allergy/sensitivity or any hypersensitivity to components of study drugs or their formulation.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of decompensated liver disease manifested by the presence of or history of ascites, variceal bleeding, or hepatic encephalopathy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Other known causes of significant liver disease including chronic or acute hepatitis B, acute hepatitis A, hemochromatosis, or homozygote alpha-1 antitrypsin deficiency.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of inguinal hernia surgery and is on IFN (100 mg/week) plus RBV (400 mg/day) combination therapy for the past 9 months. Direct antiviral drugs were added to his treatment 6 months ago.
